title: Nick Thomas-Symonds – 2021 Comments on Government’s Quarantine Plans
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Nick Thomas-Symonds, the Shadow Home Secretary, on 7 February 2021.
content:
These revelations expose the fact that – as Labour warned – the UK Government’s quarantine measures will continue to leave us completely exposed to emerging strains of the virus.
